summary:
Gasparilla Island Bridge Authority - The Gasparilla Island Bridge Authority (GIBA) operates the Boca Grande Swing Bridge in Placida, Florida. It is the only land link from Charlotte County to the barrier islands. GIBA took over operations in 1998 and is a State of Florida Independent Special District. The weight limit on GIBA bridges is 80,000 lbs. Toll rates and payment methods are specified. Contact information includes phone number, mailing address, and physical address. Administrative office hours are Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm. Meetings and employment opportunities are also mentioned.

  -
